Throughout all of the radio chatter that was heard from the united federation’s communication, a few items stuck out they were a bit odd for a military unit to order, sweets, shackles, a collar and a few girly outfits were some things that weren’t something that they would need, only a teen girl would need to have like Eureka.
112121.title: Anemone's capture

choices: Anemone wants to show her off
1121211.content:
Anemone soon started to put her plan but couldn’t. The reason she can’t is for Eureka was still out.

“Man she can sleep. Why won’t she wake up? I want to have some fun with my little piglet.” Anemone said.

Anemone kept waiting while she was doing her job that Dewey wanted her to do. With everything that she has asked for there, it was only a waiting game to get going. She had gotten Eureka dressed in one of the near skin tight but still quite elastic dresses, the collar on around her neck and the shackles on her wrists and ankles. Soon Eureka began to stir which pleased the near board Anemone.

“Hangh! Where am I?” Eureka asked.

Anemone smiled at her and told her that she is now her little piglet. Eureka tried to get out but saw she was chained down to the bed. She didn’t like this for things were only going to be bad. She just hoped that Renton and them could get to her in time before things get too bad. She looked at what she was wearing and didn’t like it. It was a girly pink dress that she didn’t like. Anemone started Eureka’s piglet training and started to feed her. Eureka resisted as best she could but Anemone kept going at it. Whenever Anemone lets Eureka up and walk around, she makes sure her collar is on and doesn’t go too far from her.
1121211.title: Piglet training

choices: Eureka was entered in a competition
Anemone gets a new 'toy' to help
11212111.content:
Anemone kept working away at her piglet as hard as she could to fatten her up and to turn her into a full on piglet. Eureka was using all of her strength to resist but couldn’t. Anemone kept working away and was seeing progress so far on Eureka. Eureka was loosening up and showing the most on her belly. Most of the time Anemone kept Eureka on her either leach or tied to her bed. There were a couple bruises on Eureka from the ‘training’ Anemone was doing to her which was degrading Eureka both mentally and emotionally. When captured, Eureka weighed in at about 90 pounds.

“Lets see where you’re at now, my little piglet.” Anemone said.

She pulled Eureka over to the scale and forced her to get on. Eureka stepped onto the scale and Anemone looked. She said the scale read 150 pounds and she was growing steadily. She liked it but was a bit displeased at the current result.

“Time for my piglet to get fatter.” Anemone said.

“Please, no more. I can’t eat anymore.” Eureka said.

“Can it. You are my pig and I now own you. Without your little friends, you can’t do anything, my little piglet look-a-like.”

Anemone took her to her ‘feeding area’ for her next feeding. Eureka tried to fight back but Anemone forced her little captive to take it. Every so often, Anemone would check to see what they have done. It was barely showing any gain and this was annoying Anemone. She was still at 150 pounds and wasn’t getting any fatter. Anemone was about to go over the edge with these and told her piglet that if she doesn’t do as she wants, she would get rid of her and possibly dispose of her like a regular pig. Eureka knew what that meant and didn’t want that.

“If you keep feeding me like this, I don’t think I can gain weight.” Eureka said.

“You’re my piglet so you do what I say.” Anemone said.

She kept going with Eureka and checked every so often for any progress. It took a while before they started to show progress again. This was pleasing Anemone a bit but she wanted Eureka to be fatter.
11212111.title: Anemone checks her progress

choices: Anemone starts getting board with Eureka
Anemone wants to show her off
112121112.content:
With Anemone continuing to hand feed Eureka and her not gaining fast, she got a new idea. She would feed her constantly with something but that would be a little tricky. She looked in a catalog and soon found something interesting.

“This could work as a good new toy.” Anemone said.

She asked Dewey to get it for her and he got it. He told her to be careful with it for it could over stuff their captive and cause her to explode. Anemone got it set up and got Eureka under it. She tied her down to ensure she doesn’t escape and take it all.

“Please, let me go.” Eureka said.

“And not let me try my new toy? No way!” Anemone said.

Anemone made sure that Eureka was tied down nice and tight to ensure she doesn’t escape and ruin her fun in any way. She read the instructions while she set it up to ensure it was all working like planned. She put the hose on the bottom into Eureka’s mouth and started to fill the machine with the food she got her. Anemone watched as it came to life and start to feed her little piglet. Eureka tried to fight it but couldn’t. She just let it happen for there was no hope. The only hope she could get out of this is if Anemone lets her go or if Renton and them come to get her. Until then, she had to remain strong and hope she makes it threw this without her bursting from over feeding or Anemone disposing her like a regular pig. It didn’t take long before she was full and they watched her belly begin to push out as she was force fed more. Anemone poked her belly and when it looked like Eureka was going to explode, she stopped the machine. Eureka let out a sigh of relief for now before it starts again. Anemone kept her tied down so she doesn’t try to escape and rat her out.
112121112.title: Anemone gets a new 'toy' to help

choices: Anemone enters Eureka into a competition
Renton and them come for her
1121211122.content:
With the help of Anemone’s new ‘toy’ working like planned, Eureka was fattening up quite well. With the help of it, Eureka was fattened up to now 400 pounds. Renton and them continued to work to save her; Eureka actually was losing hope slowly on trying to be saved. She soon accepted the fact that she was just another toy for her Anemone to have fun with. After each feeding by Anemone, Eureka would ask for more. She would do so for she had accepted her fate and want to keep getting fatter for some reason. Anemone liked how her piglet was being more cooperative now but she had a little hesitation still. She didn’t care for she was now being what she wanted.

“Is everything alright, Master?” Eureka asked.

“Just thinking of what to make you wear while taking you out. This one is perfect.” Anemone said.

She picked out a pink dress that she had and got Eureka stuffed into it. She got it when Eureka was still thin but it still fit her. It showed off her curves and large belly, which Anemone loved. She then put on Eureka’s collar and leaches so she doesn’t try to escape. She pulled her along and ensured she doesn’t try to escape. She didn’t want to lose her just yet when she just got her this fat. Anemone paraded Eureka around the base a bit before taking Eureka out. Every now and again, someone would stop and admire Eureka. Anemone liked it and decided to let people have a little fun with Eureka. Someone one brought them a little food, which Anemone declined. They heard Eureka’s stomach let out a growl, which meant she was hungry. They let her eat it all and moved on. That got her thinking of what to do with her. She hasn’t fed her anything all day so why not let people feed her. Eureka liked it and people would like to feel her belly. This made the pink haired girl jealous. She continued to parade her piglet around and knew that all that people feed her would help fatten up her.
1121211122.title: Anemone wants to show her off

11212111221.content:
Looking at Eureka, Anemone got a bit of an idea. Why not show off her little piglet in a competition. She found one that would definitely work. She got Eureka dressed into a new dress and prettied her up for it upon arrival. She couldn’t believe they let her use Eureka be one the participants in a pig competition. Eureka looked around and wondered why she was with them.

“Am I worthy to partake against them?” Eureka asked.

“Do you want me to slaughter you like one?” Anemone asked.

Eureka didn’t want that to happen but to please her master. They went with the competition and Eureka did what she was supposed to do. Anemone liked how things were going and kept Eureka in line. With all the scoring and such that was going on, Anemone hopes that Eureka wins the show as best pig. It was soon down to the final judging of the contestants.

“This is it, the last of the competition and you should win.” Anemone said.

“Anything to make you happy.” Eureka said.

The judges went to each pig one by one and was soon down Eureka was the last one. They looked her over and even felt her large belly. They liked how firm but yet soft it was and how well rounded she was. After putting it all together and working the last little bit, the judging was final. Anemone waited and was as nervous as could be. Eureka went up and hugged her deep into her so that she could calm down. The winner was…
11212111221.title: Anemone enters Eureka into a competition

112121112211.content:
…Eureka by a long shot. They said that they never came across a ‘pig’ so well fattened, round and soft as well as lovely as her. Eureka smiled and took her reward for winning. Anemone hugged her piglet’s large belly and was happy she didn’t have to slaughter her.

“Now for your second reward for winning.” Anemone said.

“My second reward?” Eureka asked.

Anemone connected her leach to her collar and they went out. Eureka was a little confused on why she still needed the leach that she has. Anemone told her that it was to not only ensure she doesn’t try to escape but to also prevent her from being taken from her. Of course being a 400 pound being, that wouldn’t be easy. They arrived at a buffet which made Eureka hungry. Anemone took her in and got a table. She knew her piglet was hungry and told her to stay there and she did. Eureka saw someone that for some reason was familiar to her from before she was a piglet but couldn’t put her finger on it. She thought about it while Anemone was getting her food. When she got back, she noticed that her piglet was thinking about something and looked where she was looking.

“You are forbidden to go near that body. He is an enemy of the Federation and your health.” Anemone said.

She put her food down and Eureka got eating. Anemone got plate after plate of food for her piglet for she not only was rewarding her but also encouraging her to keep eating and get fatter. Eureka kept going even past her limits with the help, encouragement and belly rubs from Anemone. When she couldn’t take anymore, she rubbed her belly which made Anemone happy. They returned to their home and Anemone let her piglet rest for now.
112121112211.title: Eureka

1121211122111.content:
Anemone likes how Eureka was now winning any competition she was put in and how well rounded her is. She was seeing some growth on her piglet and was no longer a piglet in general. She now refers to her as her pig due to how fat she was now.

“Let’s see how big my wonderful pig has gotten.” Anemone said.

Bare skinned, Eureka stepped on the scale. Anemone looked at it when it showed her weight. She was impressed. Her once 400 pound piglet had grown into a wonderful 780 pound pig. Eureka smiled for she knew the extra 380 pounds were pleasing to her master.

“Do you want me to keep getting fatter?” Eureka asked.

“I think…”
1121211122111.title: Anemone weighs Eureka

choices: Anemone pushes Eureka a little too far
11212111221111.content:
“…You should definitely get fatter.” Anemone said.

Eureka smiled and agreed to do that. She ate everything she was given without question and liked it. She didn’t care how good or bad it tasted or what it was for she only cared about being fat and getting fatter for her master.

“That’s it, keep eating my luxurious pig.” Anemone said.

“More please.” Eureka asked.

Anemone got her pig more food and kept feeding her more and more. Eureka kept eating it as it came even when full to the point she might explode. After eating large meals, Anemone likes how Eureka just lays down where comfortable and fall asleep. She couldn’t help but feel her large belly as it raise and fell with every breath. At night, Anemone would rest her head on Eureka’s blubber or lay on her like a bed. Eureka makes sure she was safe and comfortable when she does for she doesn’t want anything to happen to her. She doesn’t mind it for it was for the comfort and pleasure of her master.
11212111221111.title: Get fatter

choices: Renton wants her to get fatter
112121112211111.content:
Anemone really loves her piglet and hoped that she could continue to keep getting fatter and remain hers. Eureka was doing the best she could but with her larger size and slow growth, it was getting a bit hard for her while she was getting fatter was limiting her mobility. Anemone loves showing her off and hoped that she could keep going at it.

“Is everything alright?” Eureka asked.

“I’m fine. Just those pests are coming back to get you.” Anemone asked.

Eureka thought and remembered them. She decided to help them and could tell when they were near. She waited and when they were making another attack to get her, she got going. After Anemone finished stuffing her, Eureka attacked and knocked her out. The artificial Coralian was taken with Eureka as their captive. That and the fact that she has been still a bit obedient to her. The Federation would’ve recaptured her or even attacked her if she wasn’t carrying Anemone. When she was at a good spot, she saw them and Renton in the Nirvash came to her. It was a struggle but they managed to get her in with Anemone into the Nirvash. They took off with a fattened Eureka and a captive. When they returned to the Gekko which is where everyone saw the large Coralian. They put Anemone where she wouldn’t be a problem and tried to keep her away from Eureka as much as possible.

“I still believe her to be my master but nothing could beat the control of my lover.” Eureka said.

Renton blushed and thought about her ‘master’ and what to do with her. Then he got a strange idea. Why not try to make her believe he really was her master and not Anemone. It was a bit of a struggle but she was porously doing this for fun of it.

“Don’t worry, master, I’m just having a little fun with you.” Eureka said.

Eureka held his hand and stayed close to him at all times. This was good for they wanted to keep a close eye on her at all times. They liked this and Anemone tried to get out and get back to her plans with Eureka.
112121112211111.title: Eureka is recaptured by Renton

choices: Eureka becomes back to mentally her old self
11212111222.content:
Eureka liked being Anemone’s pet and referred to herself not as Eureka but as her piglet. Anemone loves how her piglet is obeying her and fattening her up. She liked how Eureka looked in her pink dress that she didn’t get her out due to how much of a hassle it was getting her fat ass into it. She ensured it stayed clean and Eureka looking like a pig that she is.

“More please, master.” Eureka said.

“More? You just ate 10 cakes and 5 large bowls of ramen. Anymore and my special piglet will explode.” Anemone said.

Eureka asked again for more but Anemone told her no. Eureka waited for what Anemone wanted her to do but they soon heard something happening. After a couple minutes, Renton showed up to get Eureka. He grabbed her by her thick wrist and pulled her away after knocking Anemone out. Before getting away, Eureka grabbed Anemone for she was still her master. They got back to the Gekko and looked Eureka over. They kept Anemone as their captive and tried to get their old Eureka back.
11212111222.title: Renton and them come for her

112121112221.content:
With Eureka back with them and they were working away to get her back to normal, Anemone was trying to escape to get her pig but couldn’t. It was a bit of a struggle but after the first couple of days, Eureka started to slowly return to normal. It took a good week and a half before they dehypnotized Eureka back to her normal mental state.

“Let’s get you on a diet to lose all this fat.” Renton said.

“Actually Renton, I like being this fat. It feels quite nice. Getting in and out of the Nirvash might be a problem but I think we make something work.” Eureka said.

Renton looked at her large belly and actually liked it. As for the pink dress she’s in, he could get use to it. Seeing her so happy this fat and in pink, Renton couldn’t be just as happy. It started to wear on him and decided not to make her lose weight but keep it or help her get fatter. When dinner came, Renton helped Eureka make it and ensured that she has enough to be filled. She liked it and jokingly asked for more. The crew looked at how big she was and decided to let her eat as much as she wants. When they all finished, Eureka was still a bit hungry and they decided to make it official now. They gave her what food they didn’t eat and what was left of what they made. Eureka liked it and they liked the fat Eureka more than the original thin Eureka. Before she ate everything, they brought some to Anemone before it all went to Eureka. Later that night, Mater came into her mother’s room and felt her mother’s belly. She then asked if she could sleep on it and Eureka let her.
112121112221.title: Eureka becomes back to mentally her old self

1121211122211.content:
Eureka liked how Renton loves her fat and how everyone is treating her. To be fair to her, Eureka would make some special food for Anemone, which helped calm her down and make her happy. All she does is just sit around in the small room that they keep her in all day and nothing else. When she sees Eureka, she sits and smiles. They still have a bit of a bond together so Anemone is a bit more cooperative with Eureka. Instead of her normal ways of trying to fatten up Eureka, she ate what she was given and asks if she could rest her head on her belly. Eureka let her and Anemone liked how soft she made it.

“Tell me, why do you like them so much?” Anemone asked.

“To be honest, I’m not for sure. I guess they like me for who I am.” Eureka said.

After her usual after meal nap, Anemone let Eureka go and thought of how to get out of there. She wanted to get back to Dominic and possibly recapture her piglet. Then again, she could join these people and take Renton. She planned everything out and when they change hands on who’s guarding her and when to do so. When the time came, Anemone made her break. She snuck around to find where Eureka was at and possibly get out. Then again, how is she going to get off the Gekko when she doesn’t have her own ship and move Eureka’s 400+ pound butt. After a good half hour of hiding and evading everyone, the pink haired artificial Coralian found her piglet’s pen. She was still out and just sat down on her bed. It sagged a bit due to Eureka’s new weight but still was quite comfortable and warm still. She couldn’t help but fall asleep and soon waking up to someone grabbing her. She looked up and saw it was Eureka. Instead of taking her right to where she was being held, Eureka kept her with her. To pay her back for what she did, Eureka put the collar Anemone used on her onto her ‘piglet’ and would punish her for this. To add to it, she would slap Anemone if she was bad and gave her a little snack or give her a little extra food when good. Anemone liked it and didn’t do anything to bad to make Eureka to slap her harder or even sit on her.
1121211122211.title: Anemone gets out

choices: Eureka encourages Anemone to gain weight
11212111222111.content:
Eureka liked how they let her do what she wants with Anemone and how she was starting to gain weight. Anemone on the other hand didn’t like it. She just went with it since she doesn’t want her piglet eating her. She didn’t like how she was getting fat and not Eureka getting fatter. After a week of her torment, Anemone had enough. She planned everything out and over the next week, she rehypnotized Eureka. When she was back in her control, they made their escape. When they were out of the ship and out of sight of the crew, Anemone took her collar off and put it on Eureka.

“Let’s go my little piglet. They’re waiting for us.” Anemone said.

They returned to the United Federation to resume what doing before being rudely interrupted. They got settled back into where they were at and got going. Anemone likes it and ensured that Eureka eats everything she is given. Seeing her cutely ask for more like the little piglet she is made her even happier.

“Keep eating and become fatter my piglet.” Anemone said.

They kept going at it until Eureka felt her dress was going to burst off her. Anemone likes how tight it is on her and how fat Eureka has become. With that, Anemone liked how she’s filling out with ease. If she was good, she gave Eureka a treat for doing so and was obedient like she was before the rescue. Eureka let it happen and Anemone decided to pick up her cooking. It took a bit before her cooking started to get good but Eureka didn’t care. All she cared about was food and a ton of it. Anemone liked it and thought of how to possibly make some money off it. That would be for something she would do another day.
11212111222111.title: Anemone escapes with Eureka

112121112221111.content:
Anemone continued to work at fattening up her piglet for she doesn't want her to lose weight or become thin. Eureka loved the food that Anemone was making for her and would ask for more like usual every time she eats. Looking at how things are going, Anemone had become lighter and more caring toward Eureka. She hasn't had any mental or physical problems since she relaxed and worked like this and liked it. She is no longer cruel or hard on Eureka and always makes sure she is eating enough and is happy.

"Had enough, my little piglet?" Anemone asked.

"Plenty but I can eat a little more." Eureka said.

Anemone gave her another plate and ensured she eats it all. Seeing how happy she is, Anemone thought of something. Eureka eats quite a bit but they never actually tested what her limits were. She was going to wait until Eureka was hungry to the point she's literally starving. It took a while but soon she was starving to the point she was about to start eating anything. Anemone got her settled down below the machine she used to help fatten up Eureka. She then filled it up and got it going. To push her limits, Anemone would fill it up when it starts to get low.

"Be a good little pig and eat all I give you." Anemone said.

She got the machine started and Eureka took it as it all came. She put her pudgy hands onto her belly and hoped that her hunger ends soon. Anemone smiled and rubbed her belly as she was fed. She filled the machine up when needed like planned and ensured it all went into Eureka.

"That's it, eat up my little piglet. Become fatter for me and become the full pig you are destined to be." Anemone thought.

Eureka did and soon was full. Anemone rubbed her belly for she didn’t want it to burst before she could become a full pig. The dress that Eureka was in was quite tight on her and was about to burst of her if Eureka doesn’t burst in it first. It was hard for her to move around a bit but she managed to get around still. When Eureka couldn’t eat anymore, Anemone helped her up and fed her a little more before stopping. Anemone rubbed her piglets belly as she moaned in pain from this. Eureka gave out a smile in success and love for her master.
112121112221111.title: Anemone pushes Eureka's limits

1121211122211112.content:
Anemone likes how much Eureka was able to take at once but lately she’s been doing a bit too much. Even when Eureka asks for more and eats it, Anemone over feeds Eureka a bit. This was causing Eureka some pain but she endured it. While she ate, Anemone would rub her belly and liked how big and round it is. The dress was skintight on Eureka and by the looks of things, it looks to be about ready to burst off Eureka at any moment.

"More please." Eureka asked.

"Another plate? That was your 14th plate. Then again, you are a growing piglet." Anemone said.

She got her another plate and thought of what to do with her. She could return her to the crew that kept her as a prisoner. She could show her off at a fair as the pig she is and win some money or sell her to another person. Then again, she did do all this work to fatten her up so it wouldn't be right to get rid of her work that easily. But she could use the money to keep feeding her. So Anemone decided to use her as the pig she is and got the fair. There was one there in the nearby town and got a stall. People passed by all day and would pay to get their picture taken with Eureka and even feel her belly. Anemone even had a donations box for people to give them a little to feed and take care of Eureka. They were making decent money and would stay there until the end of the of the fair to make money. When the fair ended, they returned and resumed their normal ways. The morning after returning from the fair, Eureka woke to her large belly rumbling in hunger.

“Hungry, my piglet?” Anemone asked.

“Feed me.” Eureka said.

Anemone helped Eureka up since it was hard for her to do so alone. Eureka looked at her pink haired master and said she had her potbelly still. Anemone noticed where she was looking and smiled. She said she thought of getting rid of it but kept it for her. Eureka looked at all the food that Anemone made and bought for her and got eating. Just for her, Anemone got her more and more to help fatten her up. It didn’t take long before the dress burst off Eureka due to how big she was getting. When Eureka was full, Anemone made her eat more. Eureka didn’t but took it anyways. Eureka couldn’t eat anymore but Anemone kept feeding her more and more. When there was one large cake left, Eureka truly couldn’t eat anymore.

“Please, no more. I might burst.” Eureka moaned.

“But you’ve been so good. This cake I made for you. If you don’t eat it, I will make sure you get slaughtered like a real pig.” Anemone said.

Eureka gave out another moan but took it. The pain was a bit too much for her but she took it all. When there was one piece left, Anemone kissed Eureka’s large belly. Before feeding her it, Anemone wanted to see her weight. Eureka got onto the scale and it ready 800 pounds. Eureka was struggling to walk so Anemone sat her down on her bed and got the last piece. She then fed it to her and then that’s when things went bad. Eureka’s stomach started to rumble and grown from being over stuffed and she felt everything starting to come up. Anemone didn’t want her to do that so Eureka held it in. while doing so, she looked and saw Renton come in. he was too late for Eureka’s fate had been sealed. Anemone managed to hold off Eureka’s explosion for a little longer. She got rid of Renton and the others while getting more food. She forced it into Eureka and when the last burger was fed, Eureka’s body gave out and blew up.

“Great, I lost my piglet. I wonder if those pests would let me take that little blonde girl.” Anemone said.

She went out to get her and hoped for the better with her.
1121211122211112.title: Anemone over feeds Eureka

choices: Anemone finds something to fatten Eureka up while she slept
11212111222111121.content:
Anemone was impatiently waiting in her room for some action when she got word that she’s going out. she was told to beat and if wanting to, destroy Eureka. Hearing that, Anemone had a different idea. She would capture and fatten up Eureka. She got going and started her hunt.

“There you are my little look alike.” Anemone said.

Anemone can tell that Eureka was alone. It was a tough fight but Anemone took down Eureka. She then collected her prize and returned. She was allowed to keep her for she was told to do what she wants with her. Anemone laid her down in her new bed and waited for her wake up.
11212111222111121.title: Respawn

choices: Anemone has a little fun with Eureka
112121112221111211.content:
Anemone continued to wait for Eureka to wake up and to get going. Looking at her and how she was unbound, Anemone thought of tying her up but decided not to. She took her clothes off until she was wearing nothing but her bra and panties. She then put a collar on her that only said pig on it.

“This girl can sleep. How does she get any work done with this kind of sleep schedule? Maybe I hit her too hard and possibly killed her?” Anemone said.

Anemone checked and she was definitely alive. She waited a couple more hours before trying to wake her. Now annoyed, Anemone was going to forcefully wake her up when she began to stir. She stepped back and got ready.

“Wh-where am I?” Eureka asked.

“Wakey wakey my cute little look alike.” Anemone said.

“Anemone. Why am I here and naked?”

“You’re my little piglet now. And piglets don’t wear human clothes.”

Eureka tried to escape but Anemone stopped her. She told her if she behaves, she wouldn’t tie her up.
